page.title: 10FORDHAM SUNDAY SCHOOL
page.content: Sunday school is held in the Village Hall from ten o'clock until eleven o'clock on a Sunday morning.It is run by Mr James. Sometimes instead of going into the hall the children go into the church and perform plays.Mrs Gregory plays the piano for the songs and when the children are in the hall she takes the youngest ones separately. They are all taught stories from the bible.Then they play games such as a quiz between two teams with points given for correct answers. Every Christmas the children are taken to the theatre and then back to the hall for a party. In the summer they are taken for an outing, sometimes to the sea-side.
